message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original asking price. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to propose $12,500 for the product.
